## CodingRider


* Install
```
> pip install CodingRider
> pip --no-cache-dir install CodingRider
```

* Upgrade
```
> pip install --upgrade CodingRider
```

* Uninstall
```
> pip uninstall CodingRider
```



## Link

* [PyPI CodingRider](https://pypi.org/project/CodingRider/)
* [ALUX Dev](http://dev.byrobot.co.kr/)


### ALUX
